handoff_data.summary: Completed comprehensive destination analysis for autumn Thailand (Bangkok, Phuket, Krabi) for middle plus segment, families and young travelers. Includes insights on climate, price, emotional triggers and trends.
handoff_data.context_for_next: Use focus on autumn advantages, family/25-45 segment triggers, budget logic, branded warm colors, best booking windows.
